alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Inland Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 16 at 3:41AM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Coastal Citrus and Inland Citrus Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: A freeze watch means there is the potential for widespread freezing temperatures within the next 24 to 48 hours. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
